title: FS: Lower Grade 20 Card T206 Lot **ALL SOLD**
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: Lower Grade 20 Card T206 Lot **ALL SOLD**
posts.post_content:
Hello.  I have the following 20 card T206 lot available for sale.  As you can see by the scans, the cards are lower grade.  A few beaters in the bunch but most are a bit nicer.  Payment via any method you prefer.  Thanks for looking and please e-mail me at [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions or to reserve the lot.  

**ALL SOLD**  Thanks to everybody who was interested!

One bump for a price drop before I list them individually.  T206 lots under $15 per card in any condition are getting very tough to find.  Only $12.50 per card on this one and a few nicer ones in the bunch.  $250 delivered for the lot.  Thanks!
Bump for individual pricing.  All prices are delivered.  Please e-mail me at [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to reserve any cards.  Thanks!
